text.div:
NKRS - ICD-O-3 Behaviour

This data item records the behaviour of the neoplasm at time of diagnosis according to ICD-O.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://fhir.ch/ig/ch-crl/CodeSystem/nkrs-icdo3behaviour

name: NkrsIcdO3Behaviour
title: NKRS - ICD-O-3 Behaviour

contact.name: Foundation National Institute for Cancer Epidemiology and Registration (NICER)

description: This data item records the behaviour of the neoplasm at time of diagnosis according to ICD-O.
